Messenger.1.join.description: Use this method to join a room. If the specified room does not exist, then it will be created.

user.description: User name to join the room under (must not be empty)

room.description: Name of the room to join (must not be empty)

errors.description: User name is already taken (i.e. the user has already joined the room)
User name or room name was invalid

Messenger.1.leave.description: Use this method to leave a room. The room ID becomes invalid after this call. If there are no more users, the room will be destroyed and related resources freed.

roomid.description: ID of the room to leave

errors.description: The given room ID was invalid

Messenger.1.send.summary: Sends a message to a room
Messenger.1.send.description: Use this method to send a message to a room.

roomid.description: ID of the room to send the message to

errors.description: The given room ID was invalid

roomupdate.description: Register to this event to be notified about room status updates. Immediately after registering to this notification the listener will sequentially receive updates of all rooms that have been created so far.

room.description: Name of the room this notification relates to

action.description: Specifies the room status change, e.g. created or destroyed

userupdate.description: Register to this event to be notified about room status updates. Immediately after registering to this notification the listener will sequentially receive updates of all users that have joined the room so far.

user.description: Name of the user that has this notification relates to

action.description: Specifies the user status change, e.g. join or leave a room

message.summary: Notifies about new messages in a room
message.description: Register to this event to be notified about new messages in a room.

user.description: Name of the user that has sent the message
